node.title: Josh Duggar Convicted in Child Pornography Case, Faces 20 Years in Prison
node.alt: Former reality TV star Josh Duggar was convicted Thursday of downloading and possessing child pornography by a jury in Fayetteville, Arkansas. This undated photo provided by the Washington County (Arkansas) Jail shows Joshua Duggar.
node.description: Duggar and his extensive family were formerly featured in the TLC series "19 Kids and Counting."
node.content:
["Former reality TV star Josh Duggar was convicted Thursday of downloading and possessing child pornography by a jury in Fayetteville, Arkansas.", "The 33-year-old could now face up to 20 years in prison and up to $250,000 when sentenced.", "Duggar and his extensive family were formerly featured in the TLC series 19 Kids and Counting, but the show was canceled after it was alleged that he had molested some of his sisters and a babysitter.", "The investigation into Duggar began after a Little Rock detective discovered child porn files were being shared on a computer that was linked back to Duggar, according to federal authorities.", "This is a breaking story and will be updated.", "", "
Former reality TV star Josh Duggar was convicted Thursday of downloading and possessing child pornography by a jury in Fayetteville, Arkansas. This undated photo provided by the Washington County (Arkansas) Jail shows Joshua Duggar.
"]
